title: Add workout plan generation based on fitness goals

requirements.summary: Add React Query mutation hook for workout plan generation
acceptanceCriteria: A useGenerateWorkoutPlan mutation hook is available and calls the backend actor
Hook follows the same pattern as the existing diet plan generation hook
Hook returns workout plan data, loading state, and error state

file_operations.description: Add useGenerateWorkoutPlan mutation hook that calls actor.generateWorkoutPlan(goal), following the same pattern as the existing useGenerateDietPlan mutation. The hook should accept a FitnessGoal parameter and return workout plan data with loading and error states via useMutation.

requirements.summary: Create WorkoutPlanResults component to display generated workout plans
acceptanceCriteria: WorkoutPlanResults renders a weekly schedule with day-by-day breakdown
Each day shows exercise name, sets/reps or duration
Workout type and estimated calorie burn per session are displayed
Visual style is consistent with DietPlanResults component

file_operations.description: Create a WorkoutPlanResults component that displays a WorkoutPlan object. Show the plan type as a heading, render weeklySchedule details (daysPerWeek, restDays, sessionLengthMinutes) in a summary card, display estimatedCaloriesPerSession prominently, and render exerciseList as cards showing exercise name, difficulty badge, sets/reps or durationMinutes with appropriate labels. Include onRegenerate and onReset callback props for user actions. Style consistently with DietPlanResults using the same card layout, spacing, and color tokens from the Tailwind config.

requirements.summary: Integrate workout plan generation into the UI with navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Users can access the workout plan feature from the main navigation
Workout plan is generated using the same fitness goal input used for the diet plan
Workout plan results are displayed after submission
Navigation tab or section is clearly labeled and consistent with existing UI

file_operations.description: Create a WorkoutPlannerView component following the same structure as DietPlannerView. Use DietPlannerForm to capture the fitness goal, call useGenerateWorkoutPlan mutation on form submit, manage loading and error states, and conditionally render WorkoutPlanResults when a plan is generated. Include authentication gating using useInternetIdentity. Provide regenerate and reset handlers to allow users to generate new plans or return to the form.

Add a third tab labeled 'Workout Planner' to the existing navigation alongside 'Calorie Tracker' and 'AI Diet Planner'. Import WorkoutPlannerView and render it when the workout tab is active. Maintain consistent tab styling and active state handling using the same pattern as the existing tabs.
